skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world festivals
Developer Terms of Use
des: World festivals gives information on different festivals, some facts and cultural practices. Upon invoking the skill, a welcome message describes what to say to navigate through the skill. People find reasons to be happy and sometimes remember by commemoration. Holiday facts extra is a premium pack that displays images and also says facts about the various popular festivals that is celebrated in different countries.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
